title: Peri peri chicken with sweet potatoes

ingredients.item: 2 tbsp essential Waitrose White Wine Vinegar

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6. Score the chicken flesh with a sharp knife.
Mix together the spices, purée, vinegar and 3 tbsp water in a large bowl, and stir in the chicken to coat all over.
Lay chicken on a baking tray. Add the pepper and sweet potatoes and roast for 30 minutes until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
